name: Rogue Spirits
description:
Roguelikes can be extremely difficult and challenging(thats a part of their charm).This may be fine (and appriciated) for vetrans but for the uninitiated it may feel daunting.

This game intends to provide a gateway for the beginner into the wondrous world of roguelikes.

With simple controls and a carefully calibrated difficulty this game will provide endless hours of fun.
